StnryAssetCrbnFtprntItm.name: StnryAssetCrbnFtprntItm
StnryAssetCrbnFtprntItm.description: Represents the total tCO₂e emissions of individual fuel types, which are the child records of the stationary asset carbon footprint record.

EnergyIntensityVariancePct.description: The percentage difference of energy consumption intensity between the current year and the previous year for the fuel type of the carbon footprint item.

EnrgyCnsmpIntensityInKwhM2.description: The energy consumption intensity of the selected fuel type in kWh per square meter. This value is calculated based on the fuel type’s energy consumption intensity as a function of the parent carbon footprint record’s occupied floor area.

EnrgyCnsmpIntensityInKwhSqft.description: The energy consumption intensity of the selected fuel type in kWh per square foot. This value is calculated based on the fuel type’s energy consumption intensity as a function of the parent carbon footprint record’s occupied floor area.

FuelType.description: The fuel type for this carbon footprint item record. For custom fuels, if the NamespacePrefix exists then this value is {NamespacePrefix}_custom_{DeveloperName of the FuelType object}; for example, ftPackage_custom_wood, else this value is custom_{DeveloperName of the FuelType object}; for example, custom_wood.

IsRecordLocked.description: Indicates that the stationary asset carbon footprint item record and the associated energy use records are locked for editing.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of this stationery asset carbon footprint item record.

ParentCarbonFootprintId.description: The parent carbon footprint record for this carbon footprint item record.

PrevYearCarbonFootprintItemId.description: The previous year’s carbon footprint item record for the selected fuel type.

PrevYrEnrgyIntensityKwhM2.description: The consumption intensity of the selected fuel type for the previous year in kWh per square meter. This value is calculated based on the fuel type’s energy consumption intensity as a function of the parent carbon footprint record’s occupied floor area.

PrevYrEnrgyIntensityKwhSqft.description: The consumption intensity of the selected fuel type for the previous year in kWh per square foot. This value is calculated based on the fuel type’s energy consumption intensity as a function of the parent carbon footprint record’s occupied floor area.

TotEmssnUseMktBsdMthd.description: The total emissions for the carbon footprint item calculated using the market-based emissions factors.

TotalEmissionsInTco2e.description: ​​The total emissions for this carbon footprint item record in metric tonnes of carbon dioxide equivalent.

TotalEnergyConsumptionInGj.description: The total energy consumption for this carbon footprint item record in gigajoules.

TotalEnergyConsumptionInKwh.description: The total energy consumption for this carbon footprint item record in kWh.
